remarks:
The true constant has no free variables.  (This can also be proven in one step with ~ nfv , but this proof does not use ~ ax-5 .)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Oct-2016.)

 The true constant has no free variables.  (This can also be proven in one step with ~ nfv , but this proof does not use ~ ax-17 .)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Oct-2016.)
